des: "This fiery drink is meant to be slammed down with a few big gulps! It tastes like the carbonated beverage with the same name."
ins: Pour amaretto into a highball glass. Gently pour the rum over the back of a spoon, so that it forms a layer on top of the amaretto. Carefully light rum with a match. Pour in the beer, wait for flames to die down, and drink entire contents in one gulp.
